cause.description:
during the 90's, scores of women were murdered senselessly and violently, and had their bodies tossed away in the deserts of Ciudad Juarez, a city in Mexico bordering El Paso, Texas. This could still be going on, and the Mexican State Police have been grossly inefficient in finding these murderers. You can make a difference
1. Inform people that these murders occured
2. Encourage better treatment of Women and the Impoverished in general
3. stop senseless murder
cause.mission: inform people of the actrocities that occured in Juarez
cause.name: Truth about Juarez
